summary: This document contains policy guidance directives for Cuban intelligence representatives in the Dominican Republic, prepared by the General Directorate of Intelligence (DGI), MA Department, during the régime of Juan Bosch Gaviño. It outlines priorities and information guidelines for intelligence gathering in Santo Domingo, focusing on collective action against Cuba, the status of leftist forces, the Dominican Republic Armed Forces, the Dominican Communist Party, training camps, counterrevolutionary organizations, repressive corps, CIA activities, political parties, solidarity with Cuba movement, relations with the United States, the Church, and the internal situation of the armed forces.
title: Policy Guidance Directives for Cuban Intelligence Representatives in the Dominican Republic
recipient: STATE, ARMY, NAVY, AIR, NSA, DIA, INR, OCR, FBI, WH/COPS, WH/PO/A, WH/PO/B, WH/1, WH/2, WH/3, WH/3/V, WH/4, WH/5, WH/6, WH/R, WH/SA/EOB, WH/SA/MOB, WH/SA/R, WH/SA/Int, WH/SA/CI, WH/SA/SO/NS, CI/Staff, CI/Liaison, CI/R&A, RID/AN, AF/1, AF/2, AF/3, AF/4, AF/R, AF/CI, EE/K, EE/SA, EE/BR, EE/YA, EE/H, EE/P, EE/C, EE/IIS, FE/PMI/I, FE/JKO/JO, FE/JKO/K, FE/VNC/VN, FE/R, FE/CI, NE/AA/L&S, NE/AA/AP, NE/AA/E, NE/AA/I, NE/5/P, NE/6/C&I, NE/Intel, SR/CI, SR/CI/K, SR/RR, SR/O/WH, IE Canada (RCMP), IE British, L/WASH BR1
